alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 4:24AM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee Buttahatchie River near Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buttahatchie River...including Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flood water begins to cover Air Base Road located on the west bank of the river. Low-lying farmland near the river also begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 14.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 430 PM CST.
